# Theme benutzen

.pull-left4[
<ul>
  <li class="m1"><span>Package <mono>shinythemes</mono> muss einmalig installiert werden</span></li>
  <br>
  <li class="m2"><span>Danach muss das Paket in <mono>app.R</mono> geladen werden</span></li>
  <br>
  <li class="m3"><span>und dem Argument <mono>theme</mono> in der Funktion <mono>fluidPage()</mono> die Funktion <mono>shinytheme("THEME-NAME")</mono> zugewiesen werden.</span></li>
</ul>
]

.pull-right5[

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
install.packages("shinythemes")
```

in <mono>app.R</mono>:
```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(shiny)
library(shinythemes)

ui <- fluidPage(
  theme = shinytheme("THEME-NAME")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```

]

.pull-left35[

# Manuelles Styling

<ul>
  <li class="m1"><span>Das Paket <mono>bslib</mono> erlaubt manuelles theming</span></li>
  <li class="m2"><span>Die Funktion <mono>bs_theme()</mono> unterstützt einige Argumente für visuelle Anpassungen</span></li>
</ul>

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(shiny)
library(bslib)

ui <- fluidPage(
  theme = bs_theme(
    version = 3
  )
)

```

]

.pull-right6[
<br><br>
<p align="center">
<img src="image/bslib/bslib.png">
</p>
]

---

.pull-left35[

# Hintergrund

<ul>
  <li class="m1"><span>Mit den Argumenten <mono>bg</mono> und <mono>fg</mono> lassen sich Hintergrund- und Vordergrundfarbe definieren</span></li>
</ul>

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(shiny)
library(bslib)

ui <- fluidPage(
  theme = bs_theme(
    version = 3,
    bg = "#0b0f19", 
    fg = "#ffffff"
  )
)

```

]

.pull-right6[
<br><br>
<p align="center">
<img src="image/bslib/bslib_bg.png">
</p>
]


---

.pull-left35[

# Akzentfarben

<ul>
  <li class="m1"><span>Mit den Argumenten <mono>primary</mono> und <mono>danger</mono> lassen sich Akzentfarben von Buttons und anderen Elementen anpassen</span></li>
</ul>

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(shiny)
library(bslib)

ui <- fluidPage(
  theme = bs_theme(
    version = 3,
    bg = "#0b0f19", 
    fg = "#ffffff",
    primary = "#6366f1",
    danger = "#cf48ef"
  )
)

```

]

.pull-right6[
<br><br>
<p align="center">
<img src="image/bslib/bslib_bg_statecols.png">
</p>
]

---

.pull-left35[

# Fonts

<ul>
  <li class="m1"><span>Mit den Argumenten <mono>base_font</mono> und <mono>heading_font</mono> lassen sich Fonts anpassen</span></li>
</ul>

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(shiny)
library(bslib)

ui <- fluidPage(
  theme = bs_theme(
    version = 3,
    bg = "#0b0f19", 
    fg = "#ffffff",
    primary = "#6366f1",
    danger = "#cf48ef",
    base_font = "Arial",
    heading_font = "Courier"
  )
)

```

]

.pull-right6[
<br><br>
<p align="center">
<img src="image/bslib/bslib_bg_statecols_fonts.png">
</p>
]

---

.pull-left35[

# Schriftgrösse

<ul>
  <li class="m1"><span>Mit dem Argument <mono>font_scale</mono> lässt sich die Schriftgrösse ändern</span></li>
</ul>

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(shiny)
library(bslib)

ui <- fluidPage(
  theme = bs_theme(
    version = 3,
    bg = "#0b0f19", 
    fg = "#ffffff",
    primary = "#6366f1",
    danger = "#cf48ef",
    base_font = "Arial",
    heading_font = "Courier",
    font_scale = 1.2
  )
)

```

]

<br><br>

</p>
]
